toc.name: Mixins
toc.description: These are reusable chunks of styles. By extracting common ones into small utilities you avoid repetition and mistakes.

toc.name: Color
toc.description: Functions that help creating and modifying colors.

toc.name: Shorthands
toc.description: Functions that help write nicer code. They're shorter, of course, but they also make it easy to pass in multiple variables without resorting to string concatenation.

toc.name: Helpers
toc.description: Tiny helper functions that make your life easier.
